name: outdoor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 existing, happening, or done outside, rather than inside a building: an outdoor swimming pool/festival outdoor clothes
liking or relating to outdoor activities, such as walking and climbing: Sara's not really the outdoor type.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's an outdoor party, so dress informally.I enjoy outdoor pursuits, like hiking and riding.The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool.We offer our guests a wide range of outdoor activities.A number of outdoor concerts will be held during the summer.
